columns.name: PAT_ENC_CSN_ID
columns.description: A unique serial number for this encounter. This number is unique across all patients and encounters in the system.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number of the letter within the encounter. This is the second column in the primary key and, in addition to the contact serial number, uniquely identifies a letter within an encounter.

columns.name: PAT_ID
columns.description: The unique ID assigned to the patient record.

columns.name: LETTER_ID_SMARTTEXT_NAME
columns.description: The name of the SmartText record.

columns.name: UPDATE_INSTANT
columns.description: When the letter was last updated (added or printed)

columns.name: CONTACT_DATE
columns.description: The date of this contact in calendar format.
